name: College Student Hacker Guy
description:
Inspired by old school sidescroller fighting games like Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, we wanted to put a hackathon-inspired spin on an old classic. College Student Hacker Guy (CSHG) moves with arrow keys and shoots with space! They defend their Hacker Den from pesky bugs. 

This game was created by Stephanie Pena and Leehe Mahalal specfically for Hackabull 2021, a 24-hour virtual hackathon hosted by the University of South Florida. 

All in-game art and assets are hand-drawn by us, excluding the logo, made here: http://glench.com/tmnt/.
